My Favorite is AlwaysLearning. It is at Yahoogroups.
AlwaysLearning-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
You can also join by going to www.sandradodd.com/unschooling
Elissa, who will soon be singing
Yippee - Kai - Yay!

To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Monday, February 11, 2002 4:28 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] wanted


>Looking for recomendations for other homeschooling lists that you also may

messages.messageBody:
Looking for recomendations for other homeschooling lists that you also may
belong to. Have become bored with my old ones and need a lift.
You may email me privately.
Thank you.
